job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-09-02T05:31:45.000Z", "description": "Birmingham AL

Our client has created a B2C application that is used in more than half of US household and utilized by the top retailers and brands

What You Will Be Doing
  • Provide your team with the very best in leading technology
  • Impact the member app team and bring a high standard of quality and performance
  • Provide rich and appealing user experiences
  • Collaborate with the backend to keep the user a priority
  • Work together with Managers, Designers and Engineers to provide high-quality features
  • Develop react native modules and engineer react native solutions
  • Follow data-driven approaches to conduct experiments and iterate features
  • Find and fix areas that need it
  • Mentor other developers
What You Will Need
  • 5+ years\u2019 experience with cross-platform mobile app development
  • Strong knowledge of unit, integration, e2e, etc.
  • Able to convert designs into features
  • Able to work with a QA team that validates your code
  • Able to convey intricate ideas and conceptions succinctly
  • Give mentorship to the other team members
Nice to Have
  • Redux, Recoil, and other React state concepts
  • Experience of Accessibility best practices
  • Interest in Leadership opportunities
  • Open-source software and dependency management
  • Advancement of an E-commerce application
  • Experience with App distribution
Why Us

Benefits And Perks
  • Competitive Salary
  • Medical/Dental/Vision
  • 401k matching
  • Unlimited PTO
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future

Tagged as: Senior/Staff Mobile Engineer - React Native, React, eCommerce - Remote
